original_text: The strong storm continued to blow against the ship. The ship was carrying many things. So the next day, the sailors threw some of these things into the sea.
korean_text: 우리가 풍랑으로 심히 애쓰다가 이튿날 사공들이 짐을 바다에 풀어 버리고

sentences.original_text: The strong storm continued to blow against the ship.
sentences.korean_translation: 강한 폭풍이 계속해서 배를 향해 불어왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: The ship was carrying many things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 배는 많은 것들을 싣고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: So the next day, the sailors threw some of these things into the sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다음 날, 선원들은 이것들 중 일부를 바다에 던졌습니다.
